text: The bulbous dreamer (Oneirodes eschrichtii) is a species of anglerfish in the family Oneirodidae. It has a cosmopolitan distribution. It is the type species of the genus Oneirodes by monotypy. == Description == The bulbous dreamer has a crown-shaped esca with a papilla at the top. It has a spherical body. It can reach 29.7 cm (11.7 in) long. == References == Category:IUCN Red List least concern species Category:Ray-finned fish
title: Bulbous dreamer
